definition: again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to be reborn/to regenerate/to be a second so-and-so (famous dead person)/recycling/regeneration
over and over again/again and again
to give a new lease of life/to reconstruct/to reform/to rework/to recycle/to reproduce (copies, or offspring)/restoration/restructuring
to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist/unremitting efforts
to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist/unremitting efforts

sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: Your shortstop will never forget about practice again.
sentences.chinese: 您的游击手将永远不会忘记的再实践。

sentences.english: All of them insisted on my staying with them a few days longer.
sentences.chinese: 他们所有的人都坚持要我再跟他们多呆几天时间。

sentences.english: We'll be late for the meeting if we stay any longer.
sentences.chinese: 再不走我们开会就要迟到了。

sentences.english: Again, they abstained from replying to my question.
sentences.chinese: 再一次，他们避开了我的问题。

sentences.english: Don't eat up at one and you can have it after a while.
sentences.chinese: 别一下子全吃了，留一点过会儿再吃。

sentences.english: In three more my sister would want to go.
sentences.chinese: 再过三年，妹妹也要上了。

sentences.english: But we dare not press our luck.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们不敢再碰运气了。

sentences.english: No thanks, I would rather go somewhere else.
sentences.chinese: 那就算了，我再去别的地方看看吧。

sentences.english: We are now in no way to make any further concession in price.
sentences.chinese: 我们应经无法再在价格方面做出让步了。

sentences.english: It is a bold mouse that nestles in cat's ear.
sentences.chinese: 再胆大的老鼠也不敢在猫耳朵里做窝。

sentences.english: Part four elaborates the author's opinion about the basis of the criminal responsibility of the actio libera in cause.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，原因自由行为之可罚性基础的再思考。
爬得再高一些，承担一些风险。

sentences.english: You should look at that house before you decide to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 你应该看看那栋房子再决定购买。

sentences.english: They have retrained a number of young technicians for our factory.
sentences.chinese: 他们为我厂再培训了一些年轻的技术员。

sentences.english: She said to call a week to three days before leaving.
sentences.chinese: 请在您要离开前三至七天左右再打电话过来。

definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
